Text:
can i play multiplayer with tunngle with this release 
i mean will there be issues of compatibility or something??

@ hotsmog_95

It's based on Akella version. Akella is a russian publisher, so it is VERY likely to be a russian version of the game, not english. You could try downloading though.

And answering your question if you still gonna download the game - there shouldn't be any compatibility issues. As long as people you are trying to play with have the same version.

It doesn't have a cracked DirectX 9 executable. Only DirectX 10/11. It has been said that DirectX 9 crack is coming later on. But how much later - no idea. I'm waiting for it as well.
